answerText: Epstein-Barr Virus [10] Epstein-Barr can cause this disease characterized by drowsiness, enlarged lymph nodes, and fever. It is sometimes called the "kissing disease."
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Michigan A + George Mason | 16 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Infections by this virus lead to production of antibodies to its nuclear antigens, for 10 points each. [10] Name this virus that can cause Nasopharyngeal carcinoma and Burkitt's lymphoma.
